mapper.insert: INSERT INTO cmctrapserver(entityId, topCcmtsTrapServerIndex, topCcmtsTrapServerIpAddr, topCcmtsTrapServerStatus, topCcmtsTrapServerIpPort, topCcmtsTrapCommunityName) VALUES(#{entityId}, #{topCcmtsTrapServerIndex}, #{ip}, #{topCcmtsTrapServerStatus}, #{topCcmtsTrapServerIpPort}, #{topCcmtsTrapCommunityName})
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM cmctrapserver WHERE entityId = #{entityId} AND topCcmtsTrapServerIndex = #{topCcmtsTrapServerIndex}
